column5: Check out the sail flow link zoom out so you can see all of the Great lakes and right down to Sandy what crazy power this storm has its pulling the air from up here right into the center of the storm.  BTW the pink on the screen is 40+ knot winds  http://www.sailflow.com/windandwhere.iws?regionID=210&regionProductID=3&timeoffset=3

I was looking at eastern lake erie yesterday and texted my buddy. I've never seen pink on there before. My buddy who lives down that way said there were reports of mid lake swells in the 7 meter range
